 
## Task 1: Identifying Suitable Areas for Renewable Energy Installation


Solution:

```{.js}

var srtm = ee.Image("CGIAR/SRTM90_V4");


var slope = ee.Terrain.slope(srtm);
var aspect = ee.Terrain.aspect(srtm);



var elevation_good = srtm.gt(500).and(srtm.lt(1000));
var slope_good = slope.gt(3).and(slope.lt(6));
var aspect_good = aspect.gte(135).and(aspect.lte(225));

// good aspect (exposition): 135-225Â°

var all_good = elevation_good.and(slope_good).and(aspect_good)


//Map.addLayer(srtm, {min: 0, max: 4000, palette: ["blue","yellow","red"]});
//Map.addLayer(elevation_good.selfMask(), {palette: ["red","green"]})

Map.addLayer(all_good.selfMask(), {palette: ["red","green"]})


```
